TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControl Inherits WebControl
public ref class BaseDataBoundControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl

summary.span: 充当控件的基类，这些控件使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件绑定到数据。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that bind to data using an ASP.NET data source control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持的控件体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够以一致的方式绑定到数据。ASP.NET supports a controls architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. Web 服务器控件绑定到数据的数据绑定控件，并促进绑定称为数据源控件的类称为。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 旨在使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件的数据绑定控件派生自控制类，该类定义的基本数据绑定控件功能。Data-bound controls that are designed to use ASP.NET data source controls derive from the control class, which defines the base data-bound control functionality. 可以使用 ASP.NET 中，使用提供的数据绑定控件包括， ，和，若要执行大多数涉及到显示数据的 Web 开发任务。You can use the data-bound controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks that involve displaying data. 在这些控件不提供所需的功能的情况下，您可以从继承基和类以实现自定义数据源控件。In scenarios in which these controls do not provide the functionality you need, you can inherit from the base and classes to implement your own custom data source control. 尽管支持的任何类`DataSource`并`DataSourceID`属性和`DataBind`方法是数据绑定控件，但大多数 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件扩展抽象和类。While any class that supports the `DataSource` and `DataSourceID` properties and the `DataBind` method is a data-bound control, most ASP.NET data-bound controls extend the abstract and classes. 值得注意的例外情况包括， ，和控件。Notable exceptions include , , and the controls. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类为抽象类，不能创建直接对象。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 此构造函数由派生类中定义的属性初始化的构造函数通常称为类。This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

summary.span: 设置数据绑定控件的初始化状态。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置的数据绑定控件的初始化的状态。The method sets the initialized state of the data-bound control. 调用方法类在其方法。The method is called by the class in its method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到调用的服务器控件及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写的方法来确定数据源的数据绑定控件绑定到并生成相应的控件树。The class overrides the method to identify the data source that the data-bound control binds to and builds the appropriate control trees. 数据源时解析数据源，通过标识属性优先。When resolving the data source, the data source identified by the property takes precedence. 如果未设置，标识的对象使用属性。If is not set, the object identified by the property is used. `DataBind`方法密封的所有 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件派生自。The `DataBind` method is sealed on all ASP.NET data-bound controls derived from . 数据绑定控件派生自并类应重写`PerformDataBinding`方法而不是方法以将数据绑定。Data-bound controls derived from the and classes should override the `PerformDataBinding` method instead of the method to bind data. 如果被重写和不按顺序引发事件。If is overridden, the and events are raised out of order.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DataBound As EventHandler

summary.span: 在服务器控件绑定到数据源后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the server control binds to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件通知的服务器控件为其编写的任何数据绑定逻辑都已完成的。This event notifies the server control that any data binding logic written for it has completed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置对象，数据绑定控件从该对象中检索其数据项列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the object from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

value.span: 一个表示数据源的对象，数据绑定控件从该对象中检索其数据。

span.span: An object that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将设置属性，调用方法。When you set the property, the method is called. 此外，如果已初始化的数据绑定控件，方法调用来设置属性设置为`true`。In addition, if the data-bound control has already been initialized, the method is called to set the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将使用数据绑定控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property of a data-bound control is used. 在此示例中，控件绑定到对象。In this example, the control is bound to a object. 之后属性设置，显式调用方法。After the property is set, the method is called explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDataBind/CS/gridviewdatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDataBind/VB/gridviewdatabindvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据项列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

value.span: 表示数据源的控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据。

span.span: The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已初始化的数据绑定控件 (调用方法或处理事件) 时设置属性，调用方法时，哪些集属性设置为`true`.If the data-bound control has already been initialized (the method is called or event is handled) when you set the property, the method is called, which sets the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将使用数据绑定控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property of a data-bound control is used. 控件所关联到通过设置其属性设置为"AuthorsSqlDataSource"，ID控件。The control is associated to the control by setting its property to "AuthorsSqlDataSource", the ID of the control. 当属性设置 (而不是属性)，数据绑定控件自动将绑定到数据源控件在运行时。When the property is set (instead of the property), the data-bound control automatically binds to the data source control at run time. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSimple/CS/displaycustomers.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSimple/VB/displaycustomers.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 如果设置了 属性且数据绑定控件标记为需要绑定，则调用 方法。

span.span: Calls the method if the property is set and the data-bound control is marked to require binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用期间方法，以调用如果尚未绑定的数据绑定控件的方法。The method is called during the method, to call the method if the data-bound control is not yet bound. 这是相同的行为模式(从哪些类，如派生的) 和类遵循。This is the same behavior pattern that the (from which classes such as are derived) and classes follow. `EnsureDataBound`也可能会在调用期间调用方法`CreateChildControls`和`LoadPostData`方法。The `EnsureDataBound` method might also be called during calls to `CreateChildControls` and `LoadPostData` methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并这两种方法显式设置属性设置为`true`。The and methods both explicitly set the property to `true`. 调用方法方法，虽然时，将调用引发事件。The method is called by the method, while is called when the event is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了属于派生的数据绑定控件类的属性。The following code example shows a property that belongs to a derived data-bound control class. 该示例演示如何调用数据绑定控件方法如果标识数据源的属性更改后的数据绑定控件进行初始化。The example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件，如， ， ，和使用属性，以确定是否在数据绑定控件绑定到的 ASP.NET 2.0 数据源控件，如或.Controls such as , , , and use the property to determine whether the data-bound control is bound to an ASP.NET 2.0 data source control, such as an or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性由一个派生的数据绑定控件类。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used by a derived data-bound control class. 中使用属性方法实施，以确定是否应引发事件。The property is used in the method implementation to determine whether the event should be raised. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataBound(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataBound (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnDataBound : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnDataBound : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知与控件关联的任何数据绑定逻辑都已完成的服务器控件。This method notifies a server control that any data binding logic associated with the control has completed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 派生的所有控件都密封的方法。The method is sealed on all controls derived from . 数据绑定控件应重写`PerformDataBinding`而不是方法以将数据绑定。Data-bound controls should override `PerformDataBinding` instead of the method to bind data. 如果被重写和不按顺序引发事件。If is overridden, the and events are raised out of order. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何方法用来发出由派生的数据绑定控件类的事件。The following code example demonstrates how the method is used to raise the event by a derived data-bound control class. 使用后并方法将数据绑定到控件，将数据绑定控件引发事件用于通知数据绑定的已完成。After using the and methods to bind data to the control, the data-bound control raises the event to signal that data binding is complete. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Rebinds the data-bound control to its data after one of the base data source identification properties changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时调用方法， ，或`DataMember`属性值更改后的页的任何时间事件已发生。The method is called when the , , or `DataMember` property value changes any time after the page's event has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了属于派生的数据绑定控件类的属性。The following code example shows a property that belongs to a derived data-bound control class. 该示例演示如何调用数据绑定控件方法如果标识数据源的属性更改后的数据绑定控件进行初始化。The example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先调用基类方法，然后调用方法以处理事件。The method first calls the base class method, and then calls the method to handle the event. 此外，如果 HTTP 请求到该页是一种回发，并且启用了视图状态，方法设置属性设置为`true`。Additionally, if the HTTP request to the page is a post back and view state is enabled, the method sets the property to `true`.

summary.span: 在加载数据绑定控件之前设置该控件的初始化状态。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件处理程序用于控制何时在页生命周期内发生数据绑定。The event handler is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page. 做到这一点通过设置数据绑定控件的内部初始化的状态。It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control. 由于该控件的初始化状态设置期间页面的生命周期阶段事件处理程序调用该控件的数据属性更改后该阶段，以指示该控件必须重新绑定到其数据的任何时间之前呈现。Because the control's initialized state is set during the phase of the page's lifecycle, the event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, controls how data is retrieved and bound to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类型重写此方法以从数据源检索数据。Derived types override this method to retrieve data from a data source.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应调用 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the method should be called.

value.span: 返回的值是如果数据绑定控件呈现控件之前，应调用方法; 否则，值为。

span.span: The returned value is if the data-bound control's method should be called before the control is rendered; otherwise, the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您设置属性设置为`true`时已开始数据绑定控件呈现其输出到页面、 当前 HTTP 请求不是回调，并且使用属性标识到的数据源控件绑定到立即调用方法。If you set the property to `true` when the data-bound control has already begun to render its output to the page, the current HTTP request is not a callback, and you are using the property to identify the data source control to bind to, the method is called immediately. 在这种情况下，属性实际上并未设置为`true`。In this case, the property is not actually set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性由一个派生的数据绑定控件类。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used by a derived data-bound control class. 检索数据后方法，并绑定到控件方法，属性设置为`false`和方法是调用以指示该控件已完成绑定，且不得在当前页的生命周期过程中需要此属性。After data is retrieved by the method and bound to the control with the method, the property is set to `false` and the method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires this property during the current page's lifecycle. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示如何 ASP.NET 应呈现 HTML 控件的控件处于禁用状态时。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 会将`disabled`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 会将`class`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateDataSource(object dataSource) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub ValidateDataSource (dataSource As Object)

param.name: dataSource

span.span: The object to verify.

param.span: 通常是 、、 或 的实例。

span.span: Typically an instance of , , , or .

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，验证数据绑定控件绑定到的对象是它可以使用的对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

para.span: 只有调用方法类的赋值函数 (setter) 为属性。

span.span: The method is only called in the class's mutator (setter) for the property.

para.span: 派生的类可以实现的方法来检查设置的对象的类型属性，以确保数据绑定控件可以使用该类型。

span.span: Derived classes implement the method to check the type of the object that is set for the property, to ensure that the data-bound control can work with the type.

para.span: 如果类型未被识别，派生的类型实现会引发异常。

span.span: If the type is not recognized, derived type implementations throw an exception.
